import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; class SignUpForm extends Component { constructor(){ super() this.state = { regmsg : '', loginmsg : '' } } register = (event)=>{ var ob = { name : this.name.value, email:this.email.value, address : this.address.value, password: this.password.value, dob: this.dob.value, } fetch(`http://localhost:9090/register/userRegister`,{ method : 'POST', headers:{ "Content-Type" : "application/json" }, body : JSON.stringify(ob) }).then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>{ console.log(data) /* this.setState({regmsg:data.data}) */ });; console.log(ob) event.preventDefault() } render() { return (
this.name=c} id="name" className="formFieldInput" placeholder="Enter your full name" name="name" />
this.email=c} id="email" className="formFieldInput" placeholder="Enter your email" name="email" />
this.phone=c} id="number" className="formFieldInput" placeholder="Enter your phone number" name="phone" />
this.address=c} id="address" className="formFieldInput" placeholder="Enter your Address" name="address" />
this.dob=c} id="date" className="formFieldInput" placeholder="Enter your date of birth" name="date" />
this.password=c} id="password" className="formFieldInput" placeholder="Enter your password" name="password" />
I'm already member
{this.state.regmsg}
); } } export default SignUpForm;
